author: missirol
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds the parameter `mantissaPrecision` to the plugin `HLTScoutingPrimaryVertexProducer`, similarly to the other producers of the scouting output products. Previously, a value of `10` was hard-coded.

Took this opportunity to also do some technical cleanup of this producer.

Merely technical. No changes expected.

#### PR validation:

Checked that the scouting outputs in `addOnTests.py --tests=hlt_mc_GRun` are filled.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: add `mantissaPrecision` parameter to `HLTScoutingPrimaryVertexProducer`
